basics.name: Kyle Lucas-Rodriguez
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Staff Software Engineer specializing in web security and distributed systems. 11+ years building scalable services with expertise in application security, OWASP standards, and modern observability stacks. Currently architecting Fastly's NGWAF serving millions of requests while leveraging AI tools for threat detection and analysis.

work.name: Fastly
highlights: Scaled and rearchitected NGWAF Edge provisioning, WASM deployment, and config delivery systems to meet massive product growth
Core contributor to the NGWAF edge engine processing security decisions across Fastly's global POP network
Golang, WebAssembly, Elasticsearch, MongoDB, gRPC

work.name: Fastly
highlights: Built bot detection and account takeover protection systems at CDN edge scale
Led initial implementation of provisioning, WASM deployment, and config delivery for Fastly's NGWAF Edge product
Golang, Elasticsearch, MongoDB, gRPC

work.name: Fender Musical Instruments
highlights: Led migration from third-party Lambda to native Go, reducing cold start latency and eliminating vendor dependency
Designed curriculum backend powering Fender Play's lesson delivery system
Built MusicXML parser enabling automated tablature ingestion into learning platform
Golang, Javascript, React, Lambda, DynamoDB, Postgresql, Elasticsearch

work.name: i.am+
highlights: Directed US infrastructure strategy for music streaming platform launch
Managed cross-functional coordination between US engineering and offshore teams across 3 time zones
Maintained hands-on development while owning technical architecture decisions
Golang, gRPC, Docker, Kubernetes, Postgresql, Elasticsearch, Neo4j, Ruby

work.name: i.am+
highlights: Architected music streaming infrastructure processing Gracenote and 7Digital data deliveries for AI-powered music discovery
Built distributed systems serving music metadata to internal NLP engines enabling natural language queries
Developed backend services for 'buttons' headphones and smartwatch; provided EQ tuning expertise as audio domain specialist
Golang, gRPC, Docker, Kubernetes, Postgresql, Elasticsearch, Neo4j

work.name: goSeek
highlights: Built unified booking API aggregating multiple third-party hotel providers
Ruby On Rails, Redis, Memcached, Postgresql w/ PostGIS

work.name: resound.fm
highlights: Co-founded startup; owned full platform from data modeling to infrastructure
Ruby On Rails, Redis, Websockets, Postgresql, Chef

work.name: RadPad
highlights: Redesigned backend aggregation service achieving 3x performance improvement
Ruby On Rails, Postgresql, S3

work.name: Down
highlights: Built Neo4j graph and API v2.0 powering match discovery for 1.3M users
Ruby on Rails, Neo4j, Postgresql
